Name: Deybi Yomira
description:
Deybi Yomira is 22 years old, single, and lives with her parents in the parish of San Placido of the canton of Portoviejo. It is an agricultural area par excellence with hardworking people who do farm work and raise livestock.

Deybi Yomira is a very hardworking young woman who seeks a way to earn her income and with it, get ahead with her family. She and her family work in agricultural. She learned this activity from her father from the time she was very young. They have a farm there with several hectares of cacao and plantain crops. She hopes to improve her crops genetically and thus improve the quality of her yield. They use natural irrigation systems as well as organic fertilizer and insecticide with which they try to protect the environment and have very good harvests.

This loan is to buy organic fertilizer and insecticide to improve her yield.
